name: The Forgotten Inn
description:
Congratulations, you have been hired at the Forgotten Inn. When a guest comes in please go to them to take their order, but they will only tell you what they want once! Get their drink from the bar and serve them in a timely manner. If you want to get rid of a drink drop it in the fireplace. Do well or get fired!

Controls: Use arrows keys to move and Space to take and serve bottles

This is my first completed game. It was completed as part of the Jamingtons 9.0 jam 

Credits:
Graphical sets by Crazy Bird Lady and 0x72
